body:
I have failed to get a completed build so far, but have kept retrying.

It is very resource hungry, and the absence of apt-cacher means it has to restart downloads every time one fails.

I need to use my disksize patch for gitian to have enough space. https://github.com/devrandom/gitian-builder/pull/172

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
No conflicts as of last run.

```

```
(Prefer to keep the old gitian yml removals in a separate PR)

> (Prefer to keep the old gitian yml removals in a separate PR)

#22418
@hebasto Yes, I mean *not* bundled in this PR

> (Prefer to keep the old gitian yml removals in a separate PR)

Dropped that commit

Concept NACK - I think if someone would like to maintain these descriptors for some sort of transitional period, they are free to do so, but I'm not sure they need to live here. From what I can see we've already got a fairly solid number of builders for the 22.0 rcs we've had (especially given it's a new system), so Guix doesn't seem to be scaring anyone away. Will be interesting to see how many more we end up with for final.

Ideally we'll go ahead with removing gitian from this repo shortly: #22418.

I agree with @fanquake above. It might make sense to maintain this somewhere else (could even be in the [docs](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/docs) repository which historically covers more specific building instructions), but I don't think it makes sense to have it (or anything referring to gitian) as part of this repository. It's not the recommended way to build.

Going to close this for now then. #22418 has been merged as well. 

We currently have 13 builders who have submitted sigs for the `v22.0` tag, and I'm expecting a number more.

diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,98 @@
+---
+name: "bitcoin-core-guix-linux-win"
+enable_cache: true
+sudo: true
+distro: "ubuntu"
+suites:
+- "bionic"
+architectures:
+- "amd64"
+packages:
+- "ca-certificates"
+- "curl"
+- "gnupg"
+- "netbase"
+- "wget"
+remotes:
+- "url": "https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin.git"
+  "dir": "bitcoin"
+files: []
+script: |
+  set -e -o pipefail
+
+  export TZ="UTC"
+  export BUILD_DIR="$PWD"
+  if test -n "$GBUILD_CACHE_ENABLED"; then
+    export SOURCES_PATH=${GBUILD_COMMON_CACHE}
+    export BASE_CACHE=${GBUILD_PACKAGE_CACHE}
+    mkdir -p ${BASE_CACHE} ${SOURCES_PATH}
+    GUIX_CACHE=${GBUILD_COMMON_CACHE}/guix
+
+    GUIX_SCRIPT=${GUIX_CACHE}/guix-install.sh
+    if [[ -f "${GUIX_SCRIPT}" ]]; then
+      cp ${GUIX_SCRIPT} $BUILD_DIR
+    fi
+    GUIX_TARBALL=${GUIX_CACHE}/guix-tarball-pack-x86_64-linux.tar.gz
+    if [[ -f "${GUIX_TARBALL}" ]]; then
+      export GUIX_BINARY_FILE_NAME=${GUIX_TARBALL}
+    fi
+  fi
+  export JOBS=${NUM_PROCS}
+
+  # Install guix with the installer script
+  wget -nc https://git.savannah.gnu.org/cgit/guix.git/plain/etc/guix-install.sh
+  chmod +x guix-install.sh
+  # We don't want SIGPIPE from running `yes`, so temporarily remove pipefail
+  set +o pipefail
+  yes | sudo -E ./guix-install.sh
+  set -o pipefail
+
+  # Check guix-daemon is running
+  if ! guix gc --list-failures > /dev/null; then
+    # Not running, try starting it
+    # Not all virtualization methods have systemd available, so start guix-daemon manually
+    export GUIX_LOCPATH=/var/guix/profiles/per-user/root/guix-profile/lib/locale
+    export LC_ALL=en_US.utf8
+    sudo /var/guix/profiles/per-user/root/current-guix/bin/guix-daemon --build-users-group=guixbuild --substitute-urls="https://guix.carldong.io https://ci.guix.gnu.org"&
+  fi
+
+  # Import guix cache
+  if test -n "$GBUILD_CACHE_ENABLED"; then
+    mkdir -p ${GUIX_CACHE}
+    KEYFILE="${GUIX_CACHE}/signing-key.pub"
+    STORE_FILE="${GUIX_CACHE}/guix_store.nar"
+    if [[ -f "$KEYFILE" && -f "$STORE_FILE" ]]; then
+      sudo cat file | sudo guix archive --authorize
body: Shouldn't `file` be `"${KEYFILE}"` still? (and do we actually need sudo to read it?)

+  export TZ="UTC"

+    export BASE_CACHE=${GBUILD_PACKAGE_CACHE}
+    mkdir -p ${BASE_CACHE} ${SOURCES_PATH}
body:
For safety, there should be double quotes around the variables

```suggestion
    mkdir -p "${BASE_CACHE}" "${SOURCES_PATH}"
```

+  if ! guix gc --list-failures > /dev/null; then
+    # Not running, try starting it

+  fi

+    mkdir -p ${GUIX_CACHE}
+    KEYFILE="${GUIX_CACHE}/signing-key.pub"

+    if [[ -f "$KEYFILE" && -f "$STORE_FILE" ]]; then
+      sudo cat file | sudo guix archive --authorize
body:
Oops.

`sudo` is not needed but there was a linter complaint about not having it.

diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,98 @@
+---
+name: "bitcoin-core-guix-linux-win"
+enable_cache: true
+sudo: true
+distro: "ubuntu"
+suites:
+- "bionic"
+architectures:
+- "amd64"
+packages:
+- "ca-certificates"
+- "curl"
+- "gnupg"
+- "netbase"
+- "wget"
+remotes:
+- "url": "https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin.git"
+  "dir": "bitcoin"
+files: []
+script: |
+  set -e -o pipefail
+
+  export TZ="UTC"
+  export BUILD_DIR="$PWD"
+  if test -n "$GBUILD_CACHE_ENABLED"; then
+    export SOURCES_PATH=${GBUILD_COMMON_CACHE}
+    export BASE_CACHE=${GBUILD_PACKAGE_CACHE}
+    mkdir -p ${BASE_CACHE} ${SOURCES_PATH}
+    GUIX_CACHE=${GBUILD_COMMON_CACHE}/guix
+
+    GUIX_SCRIPT=${GUIX_CACHE}/guix-install.sh
+    if [[ -f "${GUIX_SCRIPT}" ]]; then
+      cp ${GUIX_SCRIPT} $BUILD_DIR
+    fi
+    GUIX_TARBALL=${GUIX_CACHE}/guix-tarball-pack-x86_64-linux.tar.gz
+    if [[ -f "${GUIX_TARBALL}" ]]; then
+      export GUIX_BINARY_FILE_NAME=${GUIX_TARBALL}
+    fi
+  fi
+  export JOBS=${NUM_PROCS}
+
+  # Install guix with the installer script
+  wget -nc https://git.savannah.gnu.org/cgit/guix.git/plain/etc/guix-install.sh
+  chmod +x guix-install.sh
+  # We don't want SIGPIPE from running `yes`, so temporarily remove pipefail
+  set +o pipefail
+  yes | sudo -E ./guix-install.sh
+  set -o pipefail
+
+  # Check guix-daemon is running
+  if ! guix gc --list-failures > /dev/null; then
+    # Not running, try starting it
+    # Not all virtualization methods have systemd available, so start guix-daemon manually
+    export GUIX_LOCPATH=/var/guix/profiles/per-user/root/guix-profile/lib/locale
+    export LC_ALL=en_US.utf8
+    sudo /var/guix/profiles/per-user/root/current-guix/bin/guix-daemon --build-users-group=guixbuild --substitute-urls="https://guix.carldong.io https://ci.guix.gnu.org"&
+  fi
+
+  # Import guix cache
+  if test -n "$GBUILD_CACHE_ENABLED"; then
+    mkdir -p ${GUIX_CACHE}
+    KEYFILE="${GUIX_CACHE}/signing-key.pub"
+    STORE_FILE="${GUIX_CACHE}/guix_store.nar"
+    if [[ -f "$KEYFILE" && -f "$STORE_FILE" ]]; then
+      sudo cat file | sudo guix archive --authorize
body: We don't need sudo to read the keyfile, but we need to be able to pass it into `sudo guix archive`. The linter does not like `cat ${KEYFILE} | ...` and suggested that  a redirect be used (` ... < ${KEYFILE}`). But when I did that, it complained about the sudo and suggested this line.

@@ -0,0 +1,98 @@
+---
+name: "bitcoin-core-guix-linux-win"
+enable_cache: true
+sudo: true
+distro: "ubuntu"
+suites:
+- "bionic"
+architectures:
+- "amd64"
+packages:
+- "ca-certificates"
+- "curl"
+- "gnupg"
+- "netbase"
+- "wget"
+remotes:
+- "url": "https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin.git"
+  "dir": "bitcoin"
+files: []
+script: |
+  set -e -o pipefail
+
+  export TZ="UTC"
+  export BUILD_DIR="$PWD"
+  if test -n "$GBUILD_CACHE_ENABLED"; then
+    export SOURCES_PATH=${GBUILD_COMMON_CACHE}
+    export BASE_CACHE=${GBUILD_PACKAGE_CACHE}
+    mkdir -p "${BASE_CACHE}" "${SOURCES_PATH}"
+    GUIX_CACHE=${GBUILD_COMMON_CACHE}/guix
+
+    GUIX_SCRIPT=${GUIX_CACHE}/guix-install.sh
+    if [[ -f "${GUIX_SCRIPT}" ]]; then
+      cp ${GUIX_SCRIPT} $BUILD_DIR
+    fi
+    GUIX_TARBALL=${GUIX_CACHE}/guix-tarball-pack-x86_64-linux.tar.gz
+    if [[ -f "${GUIX_TARBALL}" ]]; then
+      export GUIX_BINARY_FILE_NAME=${GUIX_TARBALL}
+    fi
+  fi
+  export JOBS=${NUM_PROCS}
+
+  # Install guix with the installer script
+  wget -nc https://git.savannah.gnu.org/cgit/guix.git/plain/etc/guix-install.sh

+enable_cache: true

+suites:
+- "bionic"
+architectures:
+- "amd64"
+packages:
+- "ca-certificates"
+- "curl"
+- "gnupg"
+- "netbase"
+- "wget"
+remotes:
+- "url": "https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin.git"
+  "dir": "bitcoin"
+files: []
+script: |
+  set -e -o pipefail
+
+  export TZ="UTC"
+  export BUILD_DIR="$PWD"
+  if test -n "$GBUILD_CACHE_ENABLED"; then
+    export SOURCES_PATH=${GBUILD_COMMON_CACHE}
+    export BASE_CACHE=${GBUILD_PACKAGE_CACHE}
+    mkdir -p "${BASE_CACHE}" "${SOURCES_PATH}"
+    GUIX_CACHE=${GBUILD_COMMON_CACHE}/guix
+
+    GUIX_SCRIPT=${GUIX_CACHE}/guix-install.sh
+    if [[ -f "${GUIX_SCRIPT}" ]]; then
+      cp ${GUIX_SCRIPT} $BUILD_DIR
+    fi
+    GUIX_TARBALL=${GUIX_CACHE}/guix-tarball-pack-x86_64-linux.tar.gz
+    if [[ -f "${GUIX_TARBALL}" ]]; then
+      export GUIX_BINARY_FILE_NAME=${GUIX_TARBALL}
+    fi
+  fi
+  export JOBS=${NUM_PROCS}
+
+  # Install guix with the installer script
+  wget -nc https://git.savannah.gnu.org/cgit/guix.git/plain/etc/guix-install.sh
+  chmod +x guix-install.sh
+  # We don't want SIGPIPE from running `yes`, so temporarily remove pipefail
+  set +o pipefail
+  yes | sudo -E ./guix-install.sh
+  set -o pipefail
+
+  # Check guix-daemon is running
+  if ! guix gc --list-failures > /dev/null; then
+    # Not running, try starting it
+    # Not all virtualization methods have systemd available, so start guix-daemon manually
+    export GUIX_LOCPATH=/var/guix/profiles/per-user/root/guix-profile/lib/locale
+    export LC_ALL=en_US.utf8
+    sudo /var/guix/profiles/per-user/root/current-guix/bin/guix-daemon --build-users-group=guixbuild --substitute-urls="https://guix.carldong.io https://ci.guix.gnu.org"&
+  fi
+
+  # Import guix cache
+  if test -n "$GBUILD_CACHE_ENABLED"; then
+    mkdir -p ${GUIX_CACHE}
body:
```suggestion
    mkdir -p "${GUIX_CACHE}"
```

@@ -0,0 +1,98 @@
+---
+name: "bitcoin-core-guix-linux-win"
+enable_cache: true
+sudo: true
+distro: "ubuntu"
+suites:
+- "bionic"
+architectures:
+- "amd64"
+packages:
+- "ca-certificates"
+- "curl"
+- "gnupg"
+- "netbase"
+- "wget"
+remotes:
+- "url": "https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin.git"
+  "dir": "bitcoin"
+files: []
+script: |
+  set -e -o pipefail
+
+  export TZ="UTC"
+  export BUILD_DIR="$PWD"
+  if test -n "$GBUILD_CACHE_ENABLED"; then
+    export SOURCES_PATH=${GBUILD_COMMON_CACHE}
+    export BASE_CACHE=${GBUILD_PACKAGE_CACHE}
+    mkdir -p "${BASE_CACHE}" "${SOURCES_PATH}"
+    GUIX_CACHE=${GBUILD_COMMON_CACHE}/guix
+
+    GUIX_SCRIPT=${GUIX_CACHE}/guix-install.sh
+    if [[ -f "${GUIX_SCRIPT}" ]]; then
+      cp ${GUIX_SCRIPT} $BUILD_DIR
+    fi
+    GUIX_TARBALL=${GUIX_CACHE}/guix-tarball-pack-x86_64-linux.tar.gz
+    if [[ -f "${GUIX_TARBALL}" ]]; then
+      export GUIX_BINARY_FILE_NAME=${GUIX_TARBALL}
+    fi
+  fi
+  export JOBS=${NUM_PROCS}
+
+  # Install guix with the installer script
+  wget -nc https://git.savannah.gnu.org/cgit/guix.git/plain/etc/guix-install.sh
+  chmod +x guix-install.sh
+  # We don't want SIGPIPE from running `yes`, so temporarily remove pipefail
+  set +o pipefail
+  yes | sudo -E ./guix-install.sh
+  set -o pipefail
+
+  # Check guix-daemon is running
+  if ! guix gc --list-failures > /dev/null; then
+    # Not running, try starting it
+    # Not all virtualization methods have systemd available, so start guix-daemon manually
+    export GUIX_LOCPATH=/var/guix/profiles/per-user/root/guix-profile/lib/locale
+    export LC_ALL=en_US.utf8
+    sudo /var/guix/profiles/per-user/root/current-guix/bin/guix-daemon --build-users-group=guixbuild --substitute-urls="https://guix.carldong.io https://ci.guix.gnu.org"&
+  fi
+
+  # Import guix cache
+  if test -n "$GBUILD_CACHE_ENABLED"; then
+    mkdir -p ${GUIX_CACHE}
+    KEYFILE="${GUIX_CACHE}/signing-key.pub"
+    STORE_FILE="${GUIX_CACHE}/guix_store.nar"
+    if [[ -f "$KEYFILE" && -f "$STORE_FILE" ]]; then
+      sudo cat $KEYFILE | sudo guix archive --authorize
+      guix archive --import < ${STORE_FILE}
+    fi
+  fi
+
+  # Prep for build
+  cd bitcoin
+
+  # Define DISTNAME variable.
+  # shellcheck source=contrib/gitian-descriptors/assign_DISTNAME
+  source contrib/gitian-descriptors/assign_DISTNAME
+
+  # Do the build
+  export HOSTS="x86_64-linux-gnu arm-linux-gnueabihf aarch64-linux-gnu riscv64-linux-gnu powerpc64-linux-gnu powerpc64le-linux-gnu x86_64-w64-mingw32"
+  ./contrib/guix/guix-build
+
+  # Move all of the guix output to our output dir
+  mv guix-build-${VERSION}/output/* ${OUTDIR}
body:

```suggestion
  mv "guix-build-${VERSION}/output"/* "${OUTDIR}"
```

+  export HOSTS="x86_64-linux-gnu arm-linux-gnueabihf aarch64-linux-gnu riscv64-linux-gnu powerpc64-linux-gnu powerpc64le-linux-gnu x86_64-w64-mingw32"
+  ./contrib/guix/guix-build
+
+  # Move all of the guix output to our output dir
+  mv guix-build-${VERSION}/output/* ${OUTDIR}
+
+  if test -n "$GBUILD_CACHE_ENABLED"; then
+    cd ${BUILD_DIR}
+
+    # Cache guix installer
+    cp guix-install.sh ${GUIX_SCRIPT}
+    guix pack --profile-name=current-guix --localstatedir guix
+    GUIX_PACK_TARBALL=$(find /gnu/store -name "*-tarball-pack.tar.gz" -type f)
+    sudo cp ${GUIX_PACK_TARBALL} ${GUIX_TARBALL}
body:
```suggestion
    sudo cp "${GUIX_PACK_TARBALL}" "${GUIX_TARBALL}"
```

diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,98 @@
+---
+name: "bitcoin-core-guix-linux-win"
+enable_cache: true
+sudo: true
+distro: "ubuntu"
+suites:
+- "bionic"
+architectures:
+- "amd64"
+packages:
+- "ca-certificates"
+- "curl"
+- "gnupg"
+- "netbase"
+- "wget"
+remotes:
+- "url": "https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin.git"
+  "dir": "bitcoin"
+files: []
+script: |
+  set -e -o pipefail
+
+  export TZ="UTC"
+  export BUILD_DIR="$PWD"
+  if test -n "$GBUILD_CACHE_ENABLED"; then
+    export SOURCES_PATH=${GBUILD_COMMON_CACHE}
+    export BASE_CACHE=${GBUILD_PACKAGE_CACHE}
+    mkdir -p "${BASE_CACHE}" "${SOURCES_PATH}"
+    GUIX_CACHE=${GBUILD_COMMON_CACHE}/guix
+
+    GUIX_SCRIPT=${GUIX_CACHE}/guix-install.sh
+    if [[ -f "${GUIX_SCRIPT}" ]]; then
+      cp ${GUIX_SCRIPT} $BUILD_DIR
+    fi
+    GUIX_TARBALL=${GUIX_CACHE}/guix-tarball-pack-x86_64-linux.tar.gz
+    if [[ -f "${GUIX_TARBALL}" ]]; then
+      export GUIX_BINARY_FILE_NAME=${GUIX_TARBALL}
+    fi
+  fi
+  export JOBS=${NUM_PROCS}
+
+  # Install guix with the installer script
+  wget -nc https://git.savannah.gnu.org/cgit/guix.git/plain/etc/guix-install.sh
+  chmod +x guix-install.sh
+  # We don't want SIGPIPE from running `yes`, so temporarily remove pipefail
+  set +o pipefail
+  yes | sudo -E ./guix-install.sh
+  set -o pipefail
+
+  # Check guix-daemon is running
+  if ! guix gc --list-failures > /dev/null; then
+    # Not running, try starting it
+    # Not all virtualization methods have systemd available, so start guix-daemon manually
+    export GUIX_LOCPATH=/var/guix/profiles/per-user/root/guix-profile/lib/locale
+    export LC_ALL=en_US.utf8
+    sudo /var/guix/profiles/per-user/root/current-guix/bin/guix-daemon --build-users-group=guixbuild --substitute-urls="https://guix.carldong.io https://ci.guix.gnu.org"&
+  fi
+
+  # Import guix cache
+  if test -n "$GBUILD_CACHE_ENABLED"; then
+    mkdir -p ${GUIX_CACHE}
+    KEYFILE="${GUIX_CACHE}/signing-key.pub"
+    STORE_FILE="${GUIX_CACHE}/guix_store.nar"
+    if [[ -f "$KEYFILE" && -f "$STORE_FILE" ]]; then
+      sudo cat $KEYFILE | sudo guix archive --authorize
+      guix archive --import < ${STORE_FILE}
+    fi
+  fi
+
+  # Prep for build
+  cd bitcoin
+
+  # Define DISTNAME variable.
+  # shellcheck source=contrib/gitian-descriptors/assign_DISTNAME
+  source contrib/gitian-descriptors/assign_DISTNAME
+
+  # Do the build
+  export HOSTS="x86_64-linux-gnu arm-linux-gnueabihf aarch64-linux-gnu riscv64-linux-gnu powerpc64-linux-gnu powerpc64le-linux-gnu x86_64-w64-mingw32"
+  ./contrib/guix/guix-build
+
+  # Move all of the guix output to our output dir
+  mv guix-build-${VERSION}/output/* ${OUTDIR}
+
+  if test -n "$GBUILD_CACHE_ENABLED"; then
+    cd ${BUILD_DIR}
+
+    # Cache guix installer
+    cp guix-install.sh ${GUIX_SCRIPT}
+    guix pack --profile-name=current-guix --localstatedir guix
+    GUIX_PACK_TARBALL=$(find /gnu/store -name "*-tarball-pack.tar.gz" -type f)
+    sudo cp ${GUIX_PACK_TARBALL} ${GUIX_TARBALL}
+
+    # Find all of the items in the guix store and export them to the cache
+    STORE_FILES=$(find /gnu/store -maxdepth 1 -mindepth 1 -type d -not -name ".links" | sort)
+    sudo guix archive --generate-key
+    sudo cp /etc/guix/signing-key.pub ${KEYFILE}
body:
```suggestion
    sudo cp /etc/guix/signing-key.pub "${KEYFILE}"
```
